text: @realDonaldTrump @MiamiDadeCounty @USDOT Just in time to transport thousands of dead Floridians to their final resting places after the COVID-19 pandemic, for which you are responsible, has run its course. Just like you to deny funding for the states, cites, hospitals, and people in need, but you still enrich your pals. https://t.co/7eXIen7agR
